pr_title: [no ticket][risk=no] circleci config change for pupppeteer-e2e-test job

timeline.bodyText: what about the check on puppeteer local? Isn't that more of a concern here?
timeline.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure what went wrong exactly. puppeteer-e2e-local-ui job has been running okay but not for the puppeteer-e2e-test job.
replies.author: aweng98

replies.bodyText:
If we're running on the master branch, we shouldn't be skipping.
When this runs on master commits, it will always generate 0 diffs:
git diff --name-only $(git merge-base origin/master ${CIRCLE_BRANCH}) 
Previously, the "halt" command would first check whether this branch was master or a release - if so, don't skip. I don't know when that was removed, but it should probably be added back. This change achieves the same thing, though indirectly (since this job only runs on master merge).
replies.author: calbach
